channel.title: CVE Feed for Trellix -- Intrusion Prevention System (IPS) Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Trellix -- Intrusion Prevention System (IPS) Manager

item.title: CVE-2024-5956|2024-09-05T13:13:04.061Z -- trellix -- intrusion%20prevention%20system%20%28ips%29%20manager
item.description: This vulnerability allows unauthenticated remote attackers to bypass authentication and gain partial data access to the vulnerable Trellix IPS Manager with garbage data in response mostly

item.title: CVE-2024-5957|2024-09-05T13:11:11.676Z -- trellix -- intrusion%20prevention%20system%20%28ips%29%20manager
item.description: This vulnerability allows unauthenticated remote attackers to bypass authentication and gain APIs access of the Manager.

item.title: CVE-2024-5731|2024-08-01T21:18:06.887Z -- trellix -- intrusion%20prevention%20system%20%28ips%29%20manager
item.description: A vulnerability in the IPS Manager, Central Manager, and Local Manager communication workflow allows an attacker to control the destination of a request by manipulating the parameter, thereby leveraging sensitive information.

item.title: CVE-2024-5671|2024-08-01T21:18:06.834Z -- trellix -- intrusion%20prevention%20system%20%28ips%29%20manager
item.description: Insecure Deserialization in some workflows of the IPS Manager allows unauthenticated remote attackers to perform arbitrary code execution and access to the vulnerable Trellix IPS Manager.

item.title: CVE-2024-5671|2024-06-27T03:55:21.856Z -- trellix -- intrusion%20prevention%20system%20%28ips%29%20manager
item.description: Insecure Deserialization in some workflows of the IPS Manager allows unauthenticated remote attackers to perform arbitrary code execution and access to the vulnerable Trellix IPS Manager.
